{{Disambiguation}}

A '''metal''' is a generally strong [[Material (disambiguation)|material]]. There are currently three pure metals within Minecraft.

==Ingots==
* {{ItemLink|Copper Ingot}}
* {{ItemLink|Gold Ingot}}
* {{ItemLink|Iron Ingot}}

{{anchor|Alloy}}
There is also one '''alloy''':

* {{ItemLink|Netherite Ingot}}

==Blocks==
* {{BlockLink|Block of Copper}}
* {{BlockLink|Block of Iron}}
* {{BlockLink|Block of Gold}}
{{anchor|Alloy}} There is also one '''alloy block''':
* {{BlockLink|Block of Netherite}}

==Metallic elements==
{{education feature|section=1}}

Aside from gold and iron, there exist numerous [[elements]]{{only|bedrock|education}} that correspond to real-life metals. However, these do not have the same uses that gold and iron metals have in-game.
